name: Valor Quest
description: Valor Quest is the FIRST ever mythic-themed AFK idle game on Telegram, featuring hero collection, equipment hunts, and an semi auto-battle system for exciting yet relaxed gameplay.  For global players, this journey offers the ideal combination of fun and earning opportunities right from day one, while deeply immersing them in Web3 culture. The prize pool offers generous rewards for active participants, with lucky winners quickly receiving their bountiesâ€”no long waits. Tokenization of rare items invites users to explore the NFT space, and with our high-concurrency trading platform integrated natively into the game, players can access new streams of early profits.
